entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain beginning early this evening then changing to rain or drizzle after midnight. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
